author: leonardogiannini
body:
This PR contains the code to compute the new DeepVertex btag discriminator. More information can be found at https://indico.cern.ch/event/695320/contributions/2850959/,  and  recent developments at https://indico.cern.ch/event/779665/contributions/3244759/ .

The tagger is not run by default in any sequence, as futher developments and the final training are pending.

This codes integrates with the existing DeepJet code, hence an early integration allows a smoother integration of the developments of the two algorithms, avoiding conflicts such as the recent multiple changes in the subsystem naming conventions.

@arizzi
title: First version of DeepVertex b-tagger
